newsitem.title: USA: U.S. High Court to decide pension plan dispute.
newsitem.headline: U.S. High Court to decide pension plan dispute.

text.p: The U.S. Supreme Court said Monday it would decide how long a multi-employer pension plan can wait to sue an employer that has withdrawn from the plan over a dispute involving unfunded liability.
At issue is whether the statute of limitations for such a lawsuit should be based on the date the employer withdraws from the plan, or when the employer misses the payment in dispute.
The high court in a brief order said it will hear arguments in the case during its term that begins in October, with a decision expected early next year.
